name: Exclamation Mark King
description:
"Whether it's a sentence or a paragraph, in order to use the Exclamation Mark, you must consult with the KING first!"

----------------------------------------------------------------------
NFTs create a new and innovative opportunity for authors around the globe to share their story. Whether it's fiction, non-fiction, science fiction, fantasy, adventure, action, or romance, authors can take their words and bring them into a world of different possibilities. 

Gift this NFT to your favorite author and introduce them to the exciting world of NFTS!
